name: Any Game of Life
description:
Use the seed to generate new rules, or manually input a rule you already discovered in the past. Explore an entire multiverse of cellular automata rules, each behaving in interesting and unexpected ways.

Use the presets at the top of the game, to view some interesting configurations!

To simulate Conway's game of life, input rule 32535426845606726362912

There are 2^102 possible rules to discover! 

Post in the comments any interesting rules you found!!

Some interesting settings to get you started with:

top favorites (seed, density):

76, 0.0025  - arcade

270, 2.5    - canibalistic rhombuses

227, 0.0025 - dancing psychic squares

125, 0.5    - lonely traveler

198, 0.005  - checkerboard rhombus

254, 55     - cracked ice

unique ones:

359, 66 - pixelated lakes

custom rule override 32535426845606726362912 - conway's game of life
